Repeat of my post over on the messageboard...
 
Okay, so I saw it only once before I just *had* to come over and tell everyone, but that's how happy I was!  :-D
 
"Hungry Like the Wolf" (music artist = Duran Duran) by heraldtalia, released on August 12, 2004.  (This person also did one on Saitou prior to this, "Saito's Here," which is no longer available, unfortunately.)  Image quality and timing are excellent... 
 
It's available for download over on AMV... http://www.animemusicvideos.org/
 
phil
